title: jIvan mukti idE
sahitya:
jIvan mukti idE manamE jIvan mukti idE


anupallavi

  jIva jaga paramAm pAvanAtItamAm cinmaya vastuvE ninmaymAyiru


caraNam 1    Unil uyirttiDum jnAna svarUpamAm ulagellAm palavena nilaviDum onradAm
AnandAmrtamAna shuddhaTmAvAm azhivarum adanilE arivAyiruppadE
    caraNam 2    munnilap-poruLgaLin mOhamellAm pOga mummala bandhaminri ninmlamAghiyE
tannilai tAnAgat-tAkkaTrirundenrum cancalamillAda sahaja nilai peTrAl
    caraNam 3    dAha shOkangaLait-tavirtta nilaiyilE saccidAnanda para shAnta malaiyilE
EkattilE shuddha bhOgattilE pUrNa yOgattilE hamsa sOhattilE vaLar
